name: Sand Sort Puzzle
description:
Discover amazing science and art with this game "Sand Sort Puzzle" today!

Sand Sort Puzzle is an addictive puzzle game! Try to sort the colored sand in the glasses until all the glasses are sorted by the same color. It's a challenging and relaxing game to exercise your brain!

HOW TO PLAY
• Tap any glass to pour sand into another glass.
• You can only pour the sand if it is linked to the same color and there’s enough space on the glass.
• Try not to get stuck - but don’t worry, you can add glasses or restart the level at any time.

FEATURES:
• One finger control.
• Multiple unique levels
• FREE & EASY TO PLAY.
• NO penalties & time limits; you can enjoy Sand Sort Puzzle at any time!
